data.name: Hentai Fight Club Jigsaw
data.detailed_description:
Hentai Fight Club Jigsaw bring the characthers from Hentai Fight Club to a new way of play.
You will be challenged to complete 12 puzzles with the main game characters and be able
to relax and have fun without too many problems.
data.about_the_game:
Hentai Fight Club Jigsaw bring the characthers from Hentai Fight Club to a new way of play.
You will be challenged to complete 12 puzzles with the main game characters and be able

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
